definition: Tianchang county level city in Chuzhou 滁州[Chu2 zhou1], Anhui
Tianchang county level city in Chuzhou 滁州[Chu2 zhou1], Anhui
enduring while the world lasts (idiom, from Laozi); eternal/for ever and ever (of friendship, hate etc)/also written 天長地久|天长地久

Auld Lang Syne, Scottish song with lyrics by Robert Burns 羅伯特·伯恩斯|罗伯特·伯恩斯[Luo2 bo2 te4 · Bo2 en1 si1], sung to mark the start of a new year or as a farewell/also rendered 友誼萬歲|友谊万岁[You3 yi4 wan4 sui4] or 友誼天長地久|友谊天长地久[You3 yi4 tian1 chang2 di4 jiu3]
pinyin: You3 yi4 di4 jiu3 tian1 chang2

definition: see 友誼地久天長|友谊地久天长[You3 yi4 di4 jiu3 tian1 chang2]
pinyin: You3 yi4 tian1 chang2 di4 jiu3

sentences.english: However, this does not prevent us from the start of their feelings of confidence.
sentences.chinese: 可是，這並不妨礙我們對彼此感情地久天長的信心。

sentences.english: It has saved my post-shave legs from irritation and allowed me to wear shorts all summer long.
sentences.chinese: 它救了我的後刮鬍子腿從刺激和允許我穿短褲夏天長。

sentences.english: I hope we can spend just as many as more years together.
sentences.chinese: 希望我們能天長地久，永遠廝守在一起。

sentences.english: If I see you next to never. How can I say forever?
sentences.chinese: 如果我看不到你的身影，又怎能說天長地久？

sentences.english: The meeting ended up with the singing of Auld Lang Syne.
sentences.chinese: 大會以唱“友誼地久天長”結束。

sentences.english: Do you believe in perpetual love in this secular world?
sentences.chinese: 在這個世俗的世界你還相信有天長地久的愛情嗎？

sentences.english: Friendship does not last forever, and no highest power of love.
sentences.chinese: 沒有天長地久的友情，更沒有海枯石爛的愛情。

sentences.english: Two people together is not to ever do?
sentences.chinese: 兩個人在一起不就是爲了天長地久嗎？

sentences.english: Tian Chang City or field is long be amatory end.
sentences.chinese: 天長或地久是愛情的盡頭。

sentences.english: Sometimes people sing an old song called "Auld Lang Syne".
sentences.chinese: 有時，人們還會唱起老歌《友誼地久天長》。

sentences.english: The party is at the end of the song"friendship forever and ever."
sentences.chinese: 晚會在”友誼地久天長”的歌聲中結束。

sentences.english: They vowed their love would endure forever.
sentences.chinese: 他們海誓山盟地久天長。

sentences.english: If i see you next to neve , How can i say forever?
sentences.chinese: 如果我看不到你的身影，又怎能說天長地久？

sentences.english: As time went by, a lovesickness of fashionable clothes came into me.
sentences.chinese: 天長日久，我便害了一種迷戀時髦服裝的相思病。

sentences.english: I hope our friendship can be auld lang syne .
sentences.chinese: 我希望我們的友誼可以地久天長。

sentences.english: I sincerely wish us blooming career and lasting friendship.
sentences.chinese: 我衷心祝願我們的事業蒸蒸日上，友誼地久天長。

definition: Huaiyuan county in Bengbu 蚌埠[Beng4 bu4], Anhui
to have friendly relationships/circle of friends
Lianyun district of Lianyungang city 連雲港市|连云港市[Lian2 yun2 gang3 shi4], Jiangsu
postal kiosk/(old) rest shelter for couriers
Shouyang county in Jinzhong 晉中|晋中[Jin4 zhong1], Shanxi

to play the xiao 簫|箫[xiao1] (mouth organ)/to beg while playing pipes; cf politician Wu Zixu 伍子胥[Wu3 Zi3 xu1], c. 520 BC destitute refugee in Wu town, 吳市吹簫|吴市吹箫[Wu2 shi4 chui1 xiao1]/to busk/virtuoso piper wins a beauty, cf 玉人吹簫|玉人吹箫[yu4 ren2 chui1 xiao1]/(slang) fellatio/blowjob
